description:
More Than Just Another Vitamin C SerumPure Brilliance Vitamin C Serum is an optimized formulation of organic and natural ingredients for revitalizing your skinOver time your skin becomes damaged and dull from exposure to the sun and environmental toxins, along with the usual effects of aging.Regular use of Pure Brilliance Vitamin C Serum can:Stimulate Collagen productionRejuvenate dull, tired skinSmooth lines and shrink poresEnhance skin elasticity and supplenessPure Brilliance Vitamin C Serum contains a potent form of Vitamin C at the optimal amount
of 18% so it is neither too harsh, nor too weak. In addition to containing a superior form of
Vitamin C, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, it has a synergistic combination of plant derived
ingredients renowned for their healing and rejuvenating properties.Pure Brilliance Vitamin C Serum is lightweight and fast absorbing. It's suspended in a concentration containing
Organic Aloe Vera. Aloe helps shrink pores and contains natural salicylic acid. Cassia Angustifolia is a natural,
botanically derived extract used in Ayurvedic medicine. When applied topically this plant based
hyaluronic acid penetrates the skin to boost elasticity. L-Arginine is an amino acid that increases blood flow.Our Vitamin C Serum is made in the USA. Small batches ensure quality and consistency, but
result in limited quantities available for public sale.At Earth's Glow we are committed to promoting safe and natural ways to
improve your health and appearance. Our products are free of parabens, silicones,
sulfates, fragrances, phthalates or petrochemicals.Use Risk Free for 30 Days. Buy Now!
title: Vitamin C Serum for Face | With Natural Hyaluronic Acid and L-Arginine | Best Anti Aging Blend of Organic and Natural Ingredients | Lifetime Guarantee
